title: Our Marriage is a Vicious Cycle of Verbal & Emotional Abuse
description:
In today’s episode, we’re talking with a couple who needs to heal from their traumatic pasts, a husband who wants to stop hulking out when he gets upset, and a rock-star boss who wants to learn how he can support his struggling employee.
  Husband & I need to cut ties with our parents after traumatic childhoods
 Our marriage has become a vicious cycle of anger & verbal abuse
 How do I support an employee who suffers from Bipolar disorder?
 Lyrics of the Day: "Hands Down" - Dashboard Confessional
